name: div
features: SmartFlex: Flexible during play, hardens on impact
Pre-curved ergonomic shape: For a form-fitting, lightweight feel
Internal Shell : Engineered to retain shape over time & enhance impact protection
Wrap-Around Design: For superior elbow & upper arm protection
Shield Design : Cantilever top pad increases upper arm protection without restricting swing
Materials : Cushioned mesh lining moisture-wicking, UPF 50+ compression fabric keeps
Official Status : Official Protective Equipment Supplier of Major League Baseball
